actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to reauthorize the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area, Cache La Poudre National Heritage Area, and South Park National Heritage Area in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
short_title: Colorado National Heritage Areas Reauthorization Act

summary.text:
Colorado National Heritage Areas Reauthorization Act

This bill extends through FY2036 the authority of the Department of the Interior to provide assistance for

 the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area, the Cache la Poudre River National Heritage Area, and the South Park National Heritage Area.

titles.title: Colorado National Heritage Areas Reauthorization Act
Colorado National Heritage Areas Reauthorization Act

A bill to amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to reauthorize the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area, Cache La Poudre National Heritage Area, and South Park National Heritage Area in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
